title: Forgive, Forget, Fascism? Impeachin’ This Creep 2.0 1.12.21
itunes:title: Forgive, Forget, Fascism? Impeachin’ This Creep 2.0 1.12.21
description:
In episode 789, Jack and Miles are joined by Bechdel Cast's Caitlin Durante to discuss the attack on the capital and the government and mainstream media's reaction, complaints of censorship by the right, the impeachment, a new era of social media, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. A historic percentage of Americans want Trump removed from office
  2. Armed protests being planned at all 50 state capitols, FBI bulletin says
  3. Fox News Announces Major Revamp of Daytime Lineup
  4. Felons, conspiracists, GOP officials: A look at far-right Trump supporters who stormed the Capitol
  5. Kevin McCarthy’s spin on impeachment gives away a big GOP scam
  6. Trump faces impeachment again as Democrats make mockery of Constitution
  7. U.S. Capitol siege heralds tougher social media curbs, says EU commissioner
  8. WATCH: Al Pagoda - Steel

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
